# UICollectionView.ReorderingCadence.immediate

**Case**

Items are reordered into place immediately.

## Declaration

```swift
case immediate
```

## Constants

- **UICollectionView.ReorderingCadence.fast**: Items are reordered quickly, but with a short delay.
- **UICollectionView.ReorderingCadence.slow**: Items are reordered after a delay.

items.description: Items are reordered quickly, but with a short delay.
